experience.title: Freelance Web Developer
responsibilities: Assist clients with reaching their website goals by creating websites and applications with modern frameworks and technologies. Client first approach by using modern software to collaborate both ideas and content designs and page components.

Utilize modern web design practices to create fully scalable webpages and applications including TDD, AGILE workflows and DRY practices. Development languages including HTML5/CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Ruby on Rails, MySQL, NoSQL, Node, React and Redux.

experience.title: Assistant Instructor
responsibilities: With this role of Assistant Instructor, my main responsibilities included facilitating the teaching of web technologies including HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, Node.js, React, Firebase, MongoDB, MySQL, and Java

experience.title: Web Support Coordinator
responsibilities: Respond and resolve technical support tickets in a timely manner, utilizing HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and jQuery.
Working with our clients on fixes and content changes to keep their websites up to date and compliant with regulatory standards
Ensuring the web support is running efficiently and effectively

experience.title: Financial Services Representative
responsibilities: Assist clients with up to date account information on various products and services including deposit accounts, credit cards, lending and investments. Provide clients with current information and changes within the financial industry (i.e. interest rate change notice, amendments in cardholder agreements).
Deliver troubleshooting and advice towards CIBC banking products and services including debit/credit card transactions, online transactions and self-serve banking services.

Excellent customer service skills and positive attitude as demonstrated by receiving Award of Excellence Recipient for fiscal Quarter 1 2015, Quarter 1 2016 and Quarter 2 2016. Achieved by ending fiscal quarter over sales metrics and over achieving client satisfaction metrics

experience.title: Part Time Sales Representative
responsibilities: Performing customer care services such as: informing customers of new product and services, collecting monthly payments for wireline and wireless services. Handling account maintenance activities including: processing and servicing device activations and deactivations.
Customer service skills and positive attitude as demonstrated by receiving employee of the month in four consecutive months in 2014
Responsible for providing preliminary technical support for Wireline and Wireless products; including Cellular Devices, Internet Modems and Television Cable Boxes.
